name: mfx-starter
description: A no-nonsense module federation starter project to unlock your microfrontends architecture journey

scripts.start:all: concurrently "npm run dev -w mf_host" "npm run dev -w mf_provider_angular" "npm run dev -w mf_provider_svelte"
scripts.build:all: concurrently "npm run build -w mf_host" "npm run build:rs -w mf_provider_angular" "npm run build -w mf_provider_svelte"
scripts.test:all: concurrently "npm run test -w mf_host" "npm run test -w mf_provider_angular" "npm run test -w mf_provider_svelte"
scripts.lint:all: concurrently "npm run lint -w mf_host" "npm run lint -w mf_provider_angular" "npm run lint -w mf_provider_svelte"
scripts.format:all: concurrently "npm run format -w mf_host" "npm run format -w mf_provider_angular" "npm run format -w mf_provider_svelte"
scripts.type-check:all: concurrently "npm run type-check -w mf_host" "npm run type-check -w mf_provider_angular" "npm run type-check -w mf_provider_svelte"
scripts.clean:all: concurrently "npm run clean -w mf_host" "npm run clean -w mf_provider_angular" "npm run clean -w mf_provider_svelte" "npm run clean -w @mfx/shared-utils" "npm run clean -w @mfx/ui-components"
scripts.postinstall: npm run build -w @mfx/shared-utils && npm run build -w @mfx/ui-components
scripts.e2e: npm run build:all && start-server-and-test start:all http://localhost:3000 cy:run

author: Lyubomir Bozhinov
